paragraphs.body: The ${link_0} has an extensive history dating back more than twenty thousand years. This article lists historical events in a timeline.
paragraphs.text: The Avatar world has an extensive history dating back more than twenty thousand years. This article lists historical events in a timeline.

paragraphs.body: The history of this world can be roughly divided into two parts, the time before the ${link_0} and the time of the Avatar. Prior to the Avatar's creation, ${link_1} served as the protectors of mankind, allowing the humans to erect cities atop their shells. Whenever the inhabitants of their cities would venture into the ${link_2}, the creatures would bestow the people with the ability to ${link_3} the element the turtle was affiliated with; the power was to be returned upon their reentry to the city. However, after the creation of the Avatar, the ${link_4} denounced their roles as protectors of mankind, and the people were left to make their own homes scattered across the world, which eventually led to the division of the world into the ${link_5}.
paragraphs.text: The history of this world can be roughly divided into two parts, the time before the Avatar and the time of the Avatar. Prior to the Avatar's creation, lion turtles served as the protectors of mankind, allowing the humans to erect cities atop their shells. Whenever the inhabitants of their cities would venture into the Spirit Wilds, the creatures would bestow the people with the ability to bend the element the turtle was affiliated with; the power was to be returned upon their reentry to the city. However, after the creation of the Avatar, the lion turtles denounced their roles as protectors of mankind, and the people were left to make their own homes scattered across the world, which eventually led to the division of the world into the four nations.

paragraphs.body: The most notable historical event that took place during the adventures of ${link_0} was the ${link_1}, the subsequent ${link_2}, and the ${link_3}. A number of major events occurred during the time of ${link_4}'s ${link_5}, including the ${link_6}, the events surrounding ${link_7}, the ${link_8}, the ${link_9}, and the ${link_10}. Some time before Korra's era, the term "modern" was used to describe how the World of Avatar came into an industrial age.
paragraphs.text: The most notable historical event that took place during the adventures of Team Avatar was the Hundred Year War, the subsequent Harmony Restoration Movement, and the Southern Reconstruction Project. A number of major events occurred during the time of Korra's Team Avatar, including the Anti-bending Revolution, the events surrounding Harmonic Convergence, the insurrection of the Red Lotus, the formation of the Earth Empire, and the Evacuee Crisis. Some time before Korra's era, the term "modern" was used to describe how the World of Avatar came into an industrial age.

paragraphs.body: To further clarify the often confusing timeline in ${link_0}, this timeline and other articles date events as years before the ${link_1} (BG) and years after the genocide (AG). 0 AG is the year ${link_2} ${link_3} used the power from ${link_4} to begin the Hundred Year War with the Air Nomad Genocide and serves as an epoch for the dating system.
paragraphs.text: To further clarify the often confusing timeline in Avatar: The Last Airbender, this timeline and other articles date events as years before the Air Nomad Genocide (BG) and years after the genocide (AG). 0 AG is the year Fire Lord Sozin used the power from Sozin's Comet to begin the Hundred Year War with the Air Nomad Genocide and serves as an epoch for the dating system.

paragraphs.body: The Chinese zodiac is also included. It revolves around the mathematical cycle of twelve animals. The animals are listed here in order.
paragraphs.text: The Chinese zodiac is also included. It revolves around the mathematical cycle of twelve animals. The animals are listed here in order.

paragraphs.body:
1. Rat
2. Ox
3. Tiger
4. Rabbit
5. Dragon
6. Snake

paragraphs.body: On the second ring of ${link_0}'s calendar, sixteen era names are visible. However, it is unclear how these are used in the dating of the Avatar world. The era during the date of the eclipse was the Ri Wu era.
paragraphs.text: On the second ring of Wan Shi Tong's calendar, sixteen era names are visible. However, it is unclear how these are used in the dating of the Avatar world. The era during the date of the eclipse was the Ri Wu era.

paragraphs.body:
1. Ri Wu(氜武, "Superior military")
2. Chun Tai(淳泰, "Honest and exalted")
3. Zhi Yuan(坧元, "Foundation and origin")
4. Jiong Yu(烱裕, "Bright abundance")
5. Ri Long(氜隆, "Great prosperity")
6. Yi Wen(溢文, "Overflowing culture")
7. Pei Zhi(培治. "Cultivate rule")
8. Kun De(焜徳, "Shining virtue")

paragraphs.body: The first character in these two-character words has a radical (one of the 214 ideographic elements in Chinese writing used in combination with phonetics to form thousands of different characters) that represents one of the four elements, and rotates in the order air, water, earth, and fire.
paragraphs.text: The first character in these two-character words has a radical (one of the 214 ideographic elements in Chinese writing used in combination with phonetics to form thousands of different characters) that represents one of the four elements, and rotates in the order air, water, earth, and fire.

paragraphs.body: The current Ri Wu era, for example, uses the air radical (气). This system might therefore be based on the ${link_0}, with the era changing upon the death of each Avatar. If this is the case, Aang would be living during the Ri Wu (Superior military) Era, Roku during the Zhuo Guang (Brilliant light) Era, ${link_1} during the Yuan Zheng (Bastion of righteousness) Era, and so on. This would also mean Korra would be living during the Chun Tai (Honest and exalted) Era.
paragraphs.text: The current Ri Wu era, for example, uses the air radical (气). This system might therefore be based on the Avatar Cycle, with the era changing upon the death of each Avatar. If this is the case, Aang would be living during the Ri Wu (Superior military) Era, Roku during the Zhuo Guang (Brilliant light) Era, Kyoshi during the Yuan Zheng (Bastion of righteousness) Era, and so on. This would also mean Korra would be living during the Chun Tai (Honest and exalted) Era.

source.title: History of the World of Avatar
